text: uhh, guys I can't tell you enough how excited I am for this event. Things seem to be coming together well, it's really cool and inspiring to see so many of us working together to do something like this
Are there any spots left? Would really like to join but might have to attend Partner Day instead :confused: Also, are there any updates on the agenda or topics for the sessions?
Agenda is almost solidified and I am super excited about it!
i got out of partner day. you can, too.
i have faith in you. LOL
Hey Shamash, Ill be updating the speakers tonight, sorry for the delay on that. That is totally my bad

I don't know that we're ready to publicly display all of the topics but there is a good mix of speakers talking on using HubSpot's APIs and interesting CMS specific talks too. We're trying to balance the talks and it's pretty great, there will be some content for people of every skill level.
